scripts.postinstall: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path='node_modules/@types/spdx-correct'; if(!fs.existsSync(path)) process.exit(0); const entries=fs.readdirSync(path); const hasDts=entries.some(f=>f.endsWith('.d.ts')) || entries.some(f=>f==='index.d.ts'); if(!hasDts){ fs.rmSync(path,{recursive:true,force:true}); console.log('Removed broken '+path); }"
scripts.optimize:model:blend2.2: gltf-transform webp public/models/Blend2.2.glb public/models/Blend2.2-webp.glb --quality 85 && gltf-transform draco public/models/Blend2.2-webp.glb public/models/Blend2.2-optimized.glb --method edgebreaker
